attributes.action: Close all working facilities down for COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: Close all working facilities down for an appropriate amount of time amidst COVID-19 to stop the spread of the virus
attributes.background: Close all working facilities down for an appropriate amount of time amidst COVID-19 to stop the spread of the virus

rejection.details:
We're not exactly sure what you mean by "all working facilities". For example, we don't know whether you'd like this to include all shops, warehouses and healthcare facilities. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
